Question: NHOA. TCC CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
NHOA.TCC

EnergyArk

- Fireproof and fire-extinguishing UHPC energy storage cabinet
- Integrated with EV charging station
- Passed UL 9540 safety certification
- Constructed with Ultra-High Performance Concrete (UHPC)
- Offers fire resistance, heat resistance, and high-strength characteristics
- Equipped with self-developed energy management system
- Collaboration with global partners for scalable battery module and safe batteries
- Suitable for various indoor and outdoor sites
- Three different battery capacities (40, 60, and 1000)
- Ready for international markets with compliance to safety standards and rigorous testing
